author: J. Voigt
description: prompts to present when creating a new study

prompts.info: Your study name should only consist of alphanumeric characters. Example: `Pig Chewing Experiment`.
Please provide a short description of the purpose and aim of this study.
The lab member most responsible for conducting this study.

prompts.text: Metadata for this study is public?
prompts.info: Can the metadata for this study be made publicly available? Use `y` for yes or `n` for no.

prompts.text: Data for this study is public? (y|n)
prompts.info: Can the data files for this study be made publicly available? Use `y` for yes or `n` for no.

prompts.text: Additional notes or comments? (hit return for none)
prompts.info: Here you can provide additional info pertaining to this study that might be useful for future reference.
